name: Partition the word. Correct the code
instruction:
The `wordSpec` function takes one parameter - a string.

The string can only contain lowercase vowels and consonants.

The function must return an object with three properties: `vowel`, `consonant` and `length`.

The `vowel` property contains all vowels in the string, `consonant` contains all consonants, and `length` contains the length of the string.

Fix the code to make it work correctly (no errors in the loop) and analyze it.

Examples of running the function:
```javascript
wordSpec("hello") // {vowel: "eo", consonant: "hll", length: 5}
```
